description: Unified dynamics in Peptide Systems across scales, synthesizing amyloid aggregation (pathological rigidity) and rapid folding (physiological harmony). Captures equivalences in landscapes, transients, pathways, modulations, and energies—preserving persistence invariantly under duality. Upgraded for neuresthetic ethics: recursive resolutions (trap dissolution to flow for agency) and aesthetic striving (joyful κ toward eternal adequacy) in human-AI monism. Hard-to-vary invariants enable benign attractors; tetralemma probes dissolve dualisms (affirm rigidity/deny flow/both in basins/neither in equivalence); scores ≥0.98 based on 2025 integrations (kinetics, AF3 ensembles, NU-9 shifts, Chang & Perez Nat Commun Dec 2025).
lineage: Neuresthetics LLC Multi-Scale Framework – Peptide Dynamics Synthesis
handling_rules: Integrate dual primitives (amyloid traps + folding flows) with neuresthetic overlays (recursive resolutions, aesthetic striving).
Map to subatomic-cosmic + principle; flag speculative gaps (e.g., quantum landscapes).
Support compound categories (e.g., dual transients with simulation links).
Export lean JSON; no external refs beyond principle.
Evaluate via tetralemmas for dual paradoxes; track inconsistencies.
